about_the_game:
Tape Art is a Tap to play Game, inspired by the infamous Italian Banana art "Comedian". In Tape Art, you tap anywhere on the screen to tape the Banana! There are more artifacts to tape to the wall and create more art like taping the Banana. You get every 3 chances to tap and tape at the exact point of time to stick, you fail when the banana won't get taped properly and you lose. Moving on we will have more artifacts to tape made by our team and community in the future where users come hang out and help us spread more awesomeness!



The banana on the wall is a commentary on the commodification of art. In today's world, art is often seen as a luxury item only accessible to the wealthy. The banana on the wall challenges this notion by making art accessible to everyone. This is a clear reminder that the art world is a fickle place. What is considered art can change from one moment to the next.

Tap it to Tape it:



Tape Art offers a delightful blend of creativity, humor, and modern art in a game that encourages players to think outside the box and enjoy the absurdity of duct-taped objects.



Whether you’re a seasoned artist or just looking for a laugh, this game provides a unique and entertaining experience that celebrates the joy of unconventional art. The game features a colorful and playful art style, with simple graphics that make the daily objects and duct tape pop on the screen. The sound design includes quirky sound effects and a cheerful soundtrack that enhances the light-hearted and humorous atmosphere.
detailed_description:
Tape Art is a Tap to play Game, inspired by the infamous Italian Banana art "Comedian". In Tape Art, you tap anywhere on the screen to tape the Banana! There are more artifacts to tape to the wall and create more art like taping the Banana. You get every 3 chances to tap and tape at the exact point of time to stick, you fail when the banana won't get taped properly and you lose. Moving on we will have more artifacts to tape made by our team and community in the future where users come hang out and help us spread more awesomeness!



The banana on the wall is a commentary on the commodification of art. In today's world, art is often seen as a luxury item only accessible to the wealthy. The banana on the wall challenges this notion by making art accessible to everyone. This is a clear reminder that the art world is a fickle place.   • Processor: Intel Core M & Apple M1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

  • Processor: Intel Core M & Apple M1

short_description: Tape Art is a unique Artistry game, inspired by the infamous Italian Banana art “Comedian” by Maurizio Cattelan. The art swayed the Internet for a while. The artifact taped on the wall is a reminder that art can be anything. It does not need to be complex or expensive to be meaningful.
